name: Pinball Par
description:
Pinball Par isn't pinball. Instead, it's a game where you click on a blue area and a ball magically appears. Try to get the ball into the pink. You can't control the ball once you spawn it, so think carefully before making a move. Press Z to restart the level, and press X to go to the world menu.

Features:

- Wonky ""physics""

- Probably a lot of bugs

- My first game ever made (don't take it seriously; constructive feedback appreciated)

- Soundtrack that's alright

- Bright, way too simple graphics

- Only 20 levels

- Only 4 worlds

- And possibly more??
